statements: SELECT * FROM SatelliteMetrics
SELECT satellite_id, health_status FROM SatelliteMetrics WHERE health_status = 'OK'
SELECT * FROM SatelliteMetrics ORDER BY date_recorded DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT JSON_VALUE(performance_metrics, '$.temperature') AS temperature FROM SatelliteMetrics
SELECT satellite_id, health_status, date_recorded FROM SatelliteMetrics WHERE health_status = 'ERROR'
SELECT * FROM SatelliteMetrics WHERE health_status = 'OK' ORDER BY date_recorded DESC, satellite_id ASC
SELECT satellite_id, performance_metrics -> 'temperature' AS temperature FROM SatelliteMetrics WHERE performance_metrics -> 'battery_level' > 80
SELECT MAX(date_recorded) AS last_recorded_date, COUNT(*) AS total_satellites FROM SatelliteMetrics
SELECT SUM(CAST(performance_metrics ->> 'data_transferred' AS INTEGER)) AS total_data_transferred FROM SatelliteMetrics WHERE health_status = 'OK'
SELECT * FROM SatelliteMetrics ORDER BY health_status DESC, satellite_id
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, health_status FROM satellites WHERE health_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, performance_metrics->>'current_status' AS current_status FROM satellites WHERE performance_metrics->>'current_status' = 'OK';
SELECT satellite_id, temperature, pressure, signal_strength FROM telemetry_data WHERE pressure > 100 ORDER BY pressure ASC;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data
SELECT satellite_id, timestamp, temperature, pressure FROM telemetry_data WHERE temperature > 50
SELECT satellite_id, AVG(temperature) AS average_temperature FROM telemetry_data GROUP BY satellite_id
SELECT satellite_name, performance_metrics->'memory_usage' AS memory_usage FROM satellites
SELECT satellite_name, health_status, timestamp, temperature FROM telemetry_data INNER JOIN satellites ON telemetry_data.satellite_id = satellites.satellite_id
SELECT * FROM SatelliteMetrics;
SELECT satellite_id, health_status FROM SatelliteMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, battery_level FROM SatelliteMetrics WHERE health_status = 'OK';
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM SatelliteLocations ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteLogs WHERE log_timestamp > '2021-09-01';
SELECT * FROM SatelliteMetrics WHERE battery_level > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, health_status FROM SatelliteMetrics WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM SatelliteLogs WHERE satellite_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM SatelliteLocations WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude < 0 ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT satellite_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM SatelliteLogs GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100;
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, health_status FROM satellites WHERE health_status = 'OK';
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY satellite_id;
SELECT satellite_id, performance_metrics FROM satellites WHERE satellite_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM satellites;
SELECT satellite_name, health_status FROM satellites WHERE health_status = 'Good';
SELECT satellite_name, performance_metrics FROM satellites ORDER BY satellite_name DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, health_status, performance_metrics FROM satellites WHERE health_status IS NOT NULL AND satellite_name LIKE 'Sat%';
SELECT telemetry_id, timestamp, signal_strength FROM telemetry_data WHERE signal_strength > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_data ORDER BY satellite_id DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, performance_metric FROM satellite_data WHERE health_status='Good';
SELECT satellite_id, location_lat, location_long FROM satellite_location WHERE satellite_id=3;
SELECT * FROM satellite_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT satellite_id, error_code, error_description FROM satellite_errors WHERE error_code='E001';
SELECT satellite_name, health_status FROM satellite_data WHERE performance_metric > 0.8 ORDER BY satellite_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_logs WHERE log_timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT satellite_name, location_lat, location_long FROM satellite_data JOIN satellite_location ON satellite_data.satellite_id = satellite_location.satellite_id WHERE location_lat BETWEEN 35.0 AND 40.0 ORDER BY location_long DESC;
SELECT error_id, error_code, error_description FROM satellite_errors WHERE satellite_id = 3 AND error_code LIKE 'ERR%' ORDER BY error_id;
SELECT satellite_name, command_type, command_status FROM satellite_data JOIN satellite_commands ON satellite_data.satellite_id = satellite_commands.satellite_id WHERE command_status = 'PENDING';
